thread.title: Qualcomm sets new $10 billion buyback plan

title: Qualcomm sets new $10 billion buyback plan
text:
May 9, 2018 / 8:56 PM / Updated 7 hours ago Qualcomm sets new $10 billion buyback plan Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
(Reuters) - Chipmaker Qualcomm Inc ( QCOM.O ) said on Wednesday its board has approved a new $10 billion buyback program that replaces the previous $15 billion stock repurchase program announced in March 2015. FILE PHOTO: A sign on the Qualcomm campus is seen in San Diego, California, U.S. November 6, 2017. REUTERS/Mike Blake/File Photo
The earlier stock repurchase program had $1.2 billion remaining, the company said.
The companyâ€™s shares rose 2.5 percent to $54.49 in extended trading. Reporting by Laharee Chatterjee in Bengaluru
